title: 5 stories to know to start your week: Ukraine, Brent Spence, Bengals, segregation, lawyer
'I want to be able to break ground next year,' Beshear says on Brent Spence Bridge project

author: WLWT Digital Staff
title: Ohio, KY governors seek federal funding to build new bridge next to Brent Spence without tolls

sentence: Kentucky and Ohio governors Andy Beshear and Mike DeWine are asking for up to $2 billion in federal funding for the Brent Spence Bridge Corridor Project.
author: Jolene Almendarez
title: Beshear, DeWine seek $2 billion for Brent Spence Bridge companion project
